scripts.dev: npm run generate:defaults && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 NODE_ENV=development FORCE_VARSAGEL_DOMAIN=true node server.js
scripts.build: npm run generate:defaults && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const src=path.join(process.cwd(),'.next','static');const dst=path.join(process.cwd(),'.next-static-prev');if(fs.existsSync(src)){fs.rmSync(dst,{recursive:true,force:true});fs.cpSync(src,dst,{recursive:true});}" && cross-env BASELINE_BROWSER_MAPPING_IGNORE_OLD_DATA=true BROWSERSLIST_IGNORE_OLD_DATA=true NEXT_PRIVATE_WORKER_ENV=BASELINE_BROWSER_MAPPING_IGNORE_OLD_DATA,BROWSERSLIST_IGNORE_OLD_DATA NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=8192 NODE_ENV=production VERCEL=1 next build --webpack
scripts.build:staging: npm run generate:defaults && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const src=path.join(process.cwd(),'.next','static');const dst=path.join(process.cwd(),'.next-static-prev');if(fs.existsSync(src)){fs.rmSync(dst,{recursive:true,force:true});fs.cpSync(src,dst,{recursive:true});}" && cross-env CANONICAL_URL=https://staging.varsagel.com NEXT_PUBLIC_SITE_URL=https://staging.varsagel.com BASELINE_BROWSER_MAPPING_IGNORE_OLD_DATA=true BROWSERSLIST_IGNORE_OLD_DATA=true NEXT_PRIVATE_WORKER_ENV=BASELINE_BROWSER_MAPPING_IGNORE_OLD_DATA,BROWSERSLIST_IGNORE_OLD_DATA NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=8192 NODE_ENV=production VERCEL=1 next build --webpack
scripts.start:staging: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 NODE_ENV=production PORT=3006 CANONICAL_URL=https://staging.varsagel.com NEXT_PUBLIC_SITE_URL=https://staging.varsagel.com FORCE_VARSAGEL_DOMAIN=true node server.js
scripts.sync:satariz:vasita: npm run scrape:satariz:vasita -- --outDir data/satariz_taxonomy_v2 --delayMs 200 --resume --maxListings 500 && npm run import:satariz:vasita -- --srcDir data/satariz_taxonomy_v2
